mapper.insert: insert into ums_member_task (id, `name`, growth, intergration, `type`) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{growth,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{intergration,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.select: select id, `name`, growth, intergration, `type` from ums_member_task
